nodes.bodyText: I think that would make sense for another test, but this test is testing a v0.5 endpoint (i.e. very new, no deployments yet) not being found, and a v0.4 endpoint being discovered. 404ing for all endpoints would break those tests which assume a v0.4 endpoint can be found. 404ing for all endpoints is also less realistic than 503ing, i.e. I would prefer to test what happens when we just can't find an agent because it's not running or is collecting garbage or similar, rather than test what happens when it is running but an endpoint which has existed for years is not present.
